name: Monstera Deliciosa
description: The Monstera Deliciosa, also known as the Swiss Cheese Plant, is a stunning tropical houseplant known for its large, glossy, heart-shaped leaves with natural holes. Perfect for adding a dramatic touch to any indoor space.

name: Snake Plant
description: Sansevieria trifasciata, commonly known as the Snake Plant, is an incredibly low-maintenance plant perfect for beginners. Its tall, sword-like leaves with yellow edges make it a striking addition to any room.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: The Fiddle Leaf Fig is a popular indoor tree with large, violin-shaped leaves. This statement plant can grow up to 6 feet tall indoors and adds instant elegance to any space.

name: Peace Lily
description: Spathiphyllum, commonly known as Peace Lily, produces beautiful white flowers and is known for its air-purifying qualities. It thrives in low to medium light conditions.

name: Lavender
description: Fragrant lavender is perfect for outdoor gardens and containers. Known for its calming scent and beautiful purple flowers, it's also used for medicinal and culinary purposes.

name: Rose Bush
description: Classic red roses that will bloom beautifully in your garden. These hardy perennials will provide stunning flowers year after year with proper care.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Aloe Vera is a succulent plant known for its medicinal properties. The gel inside its thick leaves can be used to soothe burns and skin irritations.

name: Echinacea
description: Purple Coneflower (Echinacea) is both beautiful and medicinal. Known for its immune-boosting properties, it produces stunning purple flowers that attract butterflies.

name: Rubber Plant
description: The Rubber Plant (Ficus elastica) is an easy-care houseplant with glossy, dark green leaves. It's excellent for beginners and can grow quite large indoors.

name: Sunflower
description: Bright and cheerful sunflowers are perfect for outdoor gardens. These annual flowers can grow very tall and their seeds are edible.
